definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Apologies should not be about permission to us to forgive someone.
sentences.chinese: 道歉不应该成为我们宽恕别人的许可证。

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工厂须领有加工厂废水排放许可证。

sentences.english: See if cell-phone searches without a warrant should be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 了解下是否没有许可证进行手机搜索是合法的。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代码将遵循开放源码许可证发布。

sentences.english: Run time and designer licenses are included in all three editions.
sentences.chinese: 这三个版本中都包含运行时和设计者许可证。

sentences.english: You must get a permit if you want to keep a gun.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想持有一支枪，你必须弄一张许可证。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许可证持有人须为驻工地建筑工人提供流动洗手间。

sentences.english: They were licensing, taxation , and seditious libel.
sentences.chinese: 它们是许可证，税收和煽动性诽谤。

sentences.english: Specific training will be given to all employees on the PTW system .
sentences.chinese: 全体员工均必须接受有关作业许可证制度的具体培训。

sentences.english: An official pass or permit, especially one for crossing national boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 证明，文件一种官方通行证或许可证，尤指过。

sentences.english: We send you here with our Proforma Invoice in quadruplicate for the purpose of applying for import licence.
sentences.chinese: 现寄你形式发票一式四份，供申请进口许可证之用。

sentences.english: Navigate to the product license library or folder where you have your activation keys.
sentences.chinese: 导航到存储激活密钥的产品许可证库或文件夹。

sentences.english: You may want to provide the license and classifiers also.
sentences.chinese: 您可能还希望提供许可证与分类。

sentences.english: They help start-ups and they sell license equity.
sentences.chinese: 他们帮助新创立企业，出售许可证。

sentences.english: Though highly trained, he freelances without a license because he disdains the medical establishment.
sentences.chinese: 他自由职业者，因为他不屑无医疗机构许可证。

definition: to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
official written ruling in response to a submission/official approval in writing
